comment: A neighborhood of ` +oo ` contains an unbounded interval based at a real number. Together with ~ xrtgioo (which describes neighborhoods of ` RR ` ) and ~ mnfnei , this gives all "negative" topological information ensuring that it is not too fine (and of course ~ iooordt and similar ensure that it has all the sets we want). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
